data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 4,506 believers in Tuva and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tuva, Russia

data.prayer: Father, if there is even one of the 4,506 believers in Tuva, Russia who does not have a Bible, please provide them one today.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Tuva, Russia a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 303,394 people in Tuva who are far from you. Please add 61 new house churches this year.
Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Soyot people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Soyot people.
Please, convict the 4,506 believers in Tuva, Russia to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Tuva, Russia to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.section_summary:
the state of Tuva, Russia has a population of 307,900.

We estimate Tuva has 4,506 people who might know Jesus, 172,819 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 130,575 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: There are 307,900 people living in the state of Tuva. Only about 4,506 might be believers.
